Message:
The very last place
I visited was Fran—
the country of flowers.

I couldn’t find the
Successor anywhere else,

so that means they
must be here...

But, what if they
aren’t here, either?
That very thought terrifies me.

At this point though,
there’s just no more time
to search through the entire
world again...

I pray as I take my first step
inside Fran’s largest city.
With a light so warm and gentle,

that person is undoubtedly
the one chosen by the Staff—
the Successor.

The real journey to
save the world starts now.

I already know that
as long as people keep
others in their hearts,
light will never vanish
from the world.

“Nice to meet you. I know this is sudden,
but would you like to join me in saving the world?”
